about_the_game:
Hello gamers


This game is made by one person, so it is possible that there will be some bugs or errors in the game.
I would like to ask you to help me with this project and if there are any bugs or errors to let me know.

There will be a lot of new things and changes to the game itself. Maybe the game doesn't look great right now, but I'm trying to make it playable.



Greybit is a heart-pounding, adrenaline-fueled first-person shooter (FPS) game that pays homage to the iconic "Doom" of 1993 while bringing a fresh twist to the genre. Step into the shoes of a lone warrior, battling against hordes of demonic creatures in a nightmarish landscape where every corner hides a new threat.

―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
Set in a dystopian future where technology and ancient mysticism collide, "Greybit" plunges players into a dark, foreboding world overrun by sinister forces. As the protagonist, you'll navigate labyrinthine corridors, decaying industrial complexes, and occult-infested ruins, all rendered in gritty grayscale tones that add to the game's eerie atmosphere.

―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
Prepare to unleash hell upon your enemies with an arsenal of devastating weapons, from classic firearms to experimental prototypes, each meticulously designed to deliver maximum carnage. With fast-paced gameplay and responsive controls, every encounter is a test of skill and reflexes as you mow down legions of grotesque foes hell-bent on your destruction.

―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
In "Greybit" sometimes sheer force is your best ally. Embrace the power of overwhelming strength as you bulldoze through opposition and dominate the battlefield. Whether you're facing a swarm of foes or tearing through obstacles with raw power, victory belongs to those who assert their might without hesitation.

―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
As you progress, uncover the dark secrets lurking within the shadows, piecing together fragments of a blood-soaked battle. Face off against towering bosses that push your combat prowess to the limit, culminating in epic showdowns that will leave you breathless.

―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
With its blend of relentless action, immersive atmosphere, and nostalgic nods to gaming's past, "Greybit" offers a thrilling ride for fans of old-school shooters and newcomers alike. Are you ready to brave the darkness and become the ultimate warrior against the Greybit's relentless onslaught?
detailed_description:
Hello gamers


This game is made by one person, so it is possible that there will be some bugs or errors in the game.
I would like to ask you to help me with this project and if there are any bugs or errors to let me know.

There will be a lot of new things and changes to the game itself. Maybe the game doesn't look great right now, but I'm trying to make it playable.

name: Greybit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600K / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 6GB / AMD RX 570 4GB or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K gen / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 5700 8GB or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Greybit is a heart-pounding, adrenaline-fueled first-person shooter (FPS) game paying homage to the iconic 1993 "Doom" while adding a fresh twist. Play as a lone warrior battling hordes of demons in a nightmarish landscape where every corner hides a new threat.
